title: The Secret garden [Animated]
creator_credit: Dave Edwards, Ellen Freyer, Mike Young and Greengrass Productions
brief_description: Based on Frances Hodgson Burnett’s classic novel, this enchanting musical animated feature brings the story to life for yet another generation to cherish. Featuring radiant songs and a distinguished cast of voices, including Sir Derek Jacobi, Honor Blackman, Glynis Johns, Victor Spinetti and Frank Weller, this is quality entertainment for young viewers.
